title: Verified my email, wondering why I haven't gotten any boosts or anything.
body: I thought you got a 4-game ip or experience boost, but instead I get nothing? What happened :( they are downgrading league it seems.

replies.body: It may take about a day to process, but it may fizzle out since IP will be changing in the preseason.  Reach out to us in a ticket if you still haven't gotten it so we can take a look individually with you to see what happened.
